translation.Name: Rio Note - World Paper News #5
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: The spread of a new disease among the mainland United States has caught attention as it "reanimates the dead", according to reports. According to the U.S. government there are at least 315,245 cases confirmed in the U.S., and at least 468,987 cases around the world, but the numbers keeps rising. The government believes that the infection grows in a rate of 10,000 per day, and it has already caused two states to mobilize their military.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: Meanwhile, the discussion of if the Rio Internationals will be cancelled goes on as the fear of the new infection rises. The Internationals committee says, "The event planned for Rio a few months from now won't be cancelled," even through the state of Rio de Janeiro is still preparing for the event.
